attributes.action: Speak to me about Global warming and the oil crisis
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My name is Ahmad Khattab.  I am currently making a film about global warming and the oil problem. I would like to speak to you about this matter.  Our talk will be placed on TV.  Can you please accept this invitation?  We will have our conversation in Birmingham where I live.  I have been trusted with £500 to make this on TV.  Please reply ASAP.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
